programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.desc: A woman discovers her man has been cheating with various women; a woman suspects her husband is cheating with their roommate.

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.desc: Nicole wants her boyfriend back but only if he'll end his threesome. Next Mesha's been in love with her husband's best friend, Jamie, for four years, but she won't take "No" for an answer.

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.desc: Paris began prostituting at 11 years old and has continued for the last 10 years. She says she didn't like living by her moms rules so she left home and turned to prostitution to make money and take care of herself. Special guest host, Steve Wilkos is here to help her turn her life around.

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.desc: Fists fly when Cee Cee proposes to her boyfriend on the show; old flames come out of the woodwork to profess their love for Summer; Jon confesses a shocking secret to the woman he wants to marry.

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.sub-title: I Slept With 120 Men ... and Yours
programme.desc: Paige admits to sleeping with her friend's boyfriend; Alex confesses to cheating with two women; Kaylynn decides to get even with her friend.

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.desc: Sarah's here for Jonathan. The only problem is Lana, her best friend, who just happens to be Jonathan's girlfriend. Next Kung-fu family feud! David's here to let his brother, Lil Wayne, know that he has been sleeping with his girlfriend Ashley.

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.sub-title: You're Pregnant by Him, but It Should Be Me
programme.desc: Becca wants to rekindle her relationship with her ex, who has a pregnant new girlfriend; best friends Cory, Jess and Juan find themselves in a love triangle; siblings Keimo and Keke learn that their significant others have hooked up.

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.desc: Brady proposes to his ex-girlfriend, then she learns he cheated with her friend; Dillon feels he has to come clean about an advance he made toward his fiancee's friend.

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.desc: Danny plans to leave his child's mother for a stripper; Richard confesses to his fiancee that he cheated while she was locked up; Dorreon wants to put the kibosh on his relationship.

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.desc: D'Handsome wants to call off his engagement; Jeff wants a threesome; Jamie's boyfriend hooked up with another woman.

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.desc: Andre and Champaign’s online relationship took off, but she must admit that she’s actually a he! Shane will marry Michelle, but he’s been fulfilling his fantasy with a Dominatrix! Brandy’s wild job now involves her sister’s boyfriend!

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.desc: Edwina slept with Mike, her godsister’s fiance! Robert’s man has been fantasizing about a woman named Morgan! Mimi will fight to keep her cheating man Trayl from her best friend Keisha!

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.desc: Mr. Panama is back and still cannot decide which girl he wants to be with. Next Chauntey is a transsexual who’s cheating with her lover's brother! Later Chris is back and he's still trying to play Dee and Rhonda at the same time.

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.desc: A man cheats with his girlfriend's cousin; a man cheats on his wife with his ex-lover.

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.desc: Amanda's a workaholic mother losing her grasp on a 3rd marriage and in desperate need of help.Then Daniel's learning that all it takes to ruin an engagement is one bad night as his brief love affair with his fiancee's mother is back to haunt him!

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.desc: Freddie insists he wants to be with his wife and his days of hooking up with his ex-girlfriend are over; Carleeta devises a scheme she thinks will strengthen her bond with her sister; Shi's friend and boyfriend got to know each other better.

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.desc: Kiki taught Kat the ropes whens he started in the strip clubs and then they became lovers. But now Kat is dumping Kiki for a man! Later Cedric is here to tell his girlfriend that he wants to join him in a threesome with his secret lover, Eric!

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.desc: Shianne confronts the stripper she says is destroying her marriage; stripper Candy wants a threesome with her two female co-workers.

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.sub-title: I'm Not His Cousin, I'm His Fiancee
programme.desc: Thomas' baby's mama and fiancee demand that he choose between them; Autumn reveals her true identity to a man who is interested in her; Alyse is blind-sided by her boyfriend's ruthless rejection.

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.desc: RJ has to choose between the rockstar lifestyle or settling down with his girlfriend Elaina. Janyce learns her roommate Angel has been sharing her man David! Fed up with Stacy, Brandon lets her in on a little secret!

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.desc: Dustin admits to cheating on his partner with his middle-school crush; psychic Nana says she has a premonition that her fiance is sleeping with her friend; Desiree believes that another woman is contending with her over her boyfriend.

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.desc: Juice is here to reveal to Jessica that he’s a woman. Jolene has been sleeping with her sister’s girlfriend, Stephanie! Chante doesn’t approve of her sister’s fiancée and won’t hold her peace at their wedding!

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.desc: Angelo is here to tell his girlfriend that he's a woman. Next, Mikey brought his girlfriend here to tell her that he's been cheating on her. But she has surprise of her own. Later Jennifer feels she must tell her lover the truth about her sexuality

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.desc: Kenny lived with sisters Lora and Misty, who are also his lovers but he treats them like servants. Later, Jerry confronts Kenny with the results of the 9 positive paternity tests, but Kenny says he only cares about 2 of his 9 children.

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.desc: Morgan literally dumps his fiancé at the altar for his secret lover, Victor! Next, John is leaving his fiancé, Jamie, now that his ex-wife wants him back! Later Dave is furious with his niece because she is engaged to a man of a different race.

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.desc: Cheyenne says her boyfriend has cheated far too many times; Chanti blames her boyfriend's behavior on social media; Selina hates her brother's ex-girlfriend.

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.desc: Alex says he was forced into his relationship with his girlfriend, and he has a secret to reveal; two women wrestle in applesauce for Lexi's love; Tai has moved from Atlanta to Ohio to be with his baby-mama, but she has a confession to make.

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.desc: Antiatte's friend and sister determine whether she will accept her boyfriend's marriage proposal; two women battle it out for a porn star's love; Britanny says something is fishy about her boyfriend's behavior.

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.sub-title: I'm Cheating With Your Dad And Sister!
programme.desc: Kim says her husband of 7 years became possessive, lazy and demanding. So she got her revenge by sleeping with his father, Daniel! Later Chris is a player who's dating 2 women at the same time and they are not happy about it!

programme.title: Jerry Springer
programme.desc: Nikki, Courtney, and Samantha all want to have a three-way lesbian marriage! Then Jonathan's engaged to two different women, but after they learn they're both being playing, he's going to have to make a choice.
